name: The Training Room
description:
You are in a large training room.  It is filled with battle scared
manikins, and many other devices used in the practice of fighting.

exits.keywords: door~ 1 -1 2556 S #2560 A Bend In The Hallway~    You are at a bend in the hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The hallway continues north and west.
